properties.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 11 at 3:30PM EST by NWS Peachtree City GA
properties.description:
At 329 PM EST...a strong thunderstorm was over Cannonville, or 7
miles northeast of Lanett...moving east at 35 mph.

HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind...frequent cloud to ground lightning
and heavy rain.

IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of
light...unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary
street flooding especially in poor drainage areas.

Some locations in the path of this storm include
LaGrange, West Point, Pine Mountain, F.d. Roosevelt State Park,
Mountville, Cannonville, Louise, Odessadale, State Line Park,
Abbottsford, Stovall, Piedmont Heights, Big Springs, Durand, Jones
Crossroads, Baughs Crossroads, Smiths Crossroad, Whitesville-Pine
Lake and Long Cane.
properties.instruction:
People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear
thunder...you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists
should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to
hydroplaning.

NWSheadline: SIGNIFICANT WEATHER ADVISORY FOR NORTHERN HARRIS...TROUP AND SOUTHWESTERN MERIWETHER COUNTIES UNTIL 400 PM EST
